description:
Magical Girls are granted a wish in exchange for fighting against witches and are destined to become witches themselves. The Wings of the Magius have implemented the Embryo Eve
Awakening Operation in order to save Magical Girls from their destiny. They gather countless Magical Girls to Kamihama City but the city is thrown into a state of confusion. Emotions clash as some of the girls try to stop the operation, while some try to save their friends or have their wishes granted...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最終回直前 特別編
